dcterms:creator: H. Bunke
K. Shearer
dcterms:description: MDX is a medical knowledge base containing information about drugs, adverse effects, indications, findings, etc. It is manually curated from medical literature by editorial staff, and the text snippets are extracted from the literature as well.
dcterms:title: MDX

dcterms:creator: A. E. Johnson
T. J. Pollard
L. Shen
dcterms:description: MIMIC-III is a public dataset containing 40,000 anonymized patient health-related records. It includes information such as demographics, laboratory test results, medications, and diagnoses.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-III

dcterms:creator: J. Li
Y. Sun
R. J. Johnson
D. Sciaky
C.-H. Wei
R. Leaman
A. P. Davis
C. J. Mattingly
T. C. Wiegers
Z. Lu
dcterms:description: Bio CDR consists of 1,500 PubMed abstracts annotated with mentions of chemicals, diseases, and relations between them.
dcterms:title: Bio CDR

dcterms:creator: R. I. Dogan
R. Leaman
Z. Lu
dcterms:description: NCBI consists of 700 PubMed abstracts annotated with disease mentions and their corresponding concepts in MeSH.
dcterms:title: NCBI

dcterms:creator: S. Pradhan
N. Elhadad
W. Chapman
S. Manandhar
G. Savova
dcterms:description: ShARe comprises 433 anonymized clinical notes obtained from the MIMIC II clinical dataset and annotated with disorder mentions.
dcterms:title: ShARe
